channel.title: Problems with my server
channel.description:
How i can add command ::yell i added in client.java but i was getting errors :(
Im using 317 .. the old DeltaScape :(
Oh and how i can restart the server and add npc's in game ?
::npc 1 dont work :(
And how i can make OWNERS can trade items...atm only admins and mods can do that :((
Thx because you spend your time with me !

item.title: Problems with my server
item.dc:creator: @ImperiuM ImperiuM
item.description:
@ImperiuM wrote:

Can you get me the yell code ? And i have the ::npc in client but it dont work :-s I know it isnt permanent but i want maybe il need

Oh and you can tell me where i put yell command ? there is my client.java : http://rapidshare.com/files/330628858/client.java.html

Oh and you know how i make players drop items when they die at monsters ?

They drop all stuff only when pk…when die from a monster they don’t lose they’r stuff ~!~[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 05, 2010, 06:47:24 pm[/size][hr]Up![br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 05, 2010, 06:47:57 pm[/size][hr]UP!

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with my server
item.dc:creator: @Superd00d Superd00d
item.description:
@Superd00d wrote:

::npc isn’t permanent. Autospawn.cfg is where you add npcs, and you need a different ::yell code

Read full topic

::yell you added it , wrong place.
